text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Valga County | settlement_type = County of Estonia | image_skyline = Otepää looduspark11.JPG | image_flag = Valgamaa_lipp.svg | flag_size = 125px | image_shield = Valgamaa_vapp.svg | shield_size = 75px | image_map = Valga County in Estonia.svg | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Estonia | seat_type = Capital | seat = Valga | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = | area_total_km2 = 2043.53 | population_total = 30,931 | population_as_of = 2017 |population_rank = | population_density_km2 = 14.7 | registration_plate = G | iso_code = EE-82 | website = | footnotes = }} Valga County is a county in Estonia. The capital city is also named Valga. Otepää Nature Park, Karula National Park and Koiva-Mustjõe Landscape Conservation Area are all in the county. There are 3 municipalities: # Municipality Type Population (2015) Area km2 Density 1 Otepää Parish Rural 6,637 523 12.7 2 Tõrva Parish Rural 6,270 649 9.7 3 Valga Parish Rural 16,664 750 22.2 Category:Counties of Estonia
title: Valga County
